caption.p: Luciferase activity (in LU/ml) distribution of measures after luciferase immunoprecipitation system (LIPS) performed in (A) tick/human interface and (B) tick/cattle interface. In white: human and cattle populations exposed to tick bites; in gray: non-exposed human populations. Positivity threshold is indicated for each antigen construct. t-test statistical analysis (Î± = 0.05) was used to compare the mean LU/ml measure of both exposed and non-exposed human groups.
